participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Supportive and easy-going, with a touch of humor.
participant_1.background: i coach little league baseball. i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, with a passion for animals and law.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i dream of moving to the city. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i want to be a lawyer.
